title: The Eye of the Storm - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Acting   Adapted to Manhua   Age Progression   Celebrities   Character Growth   Childhood Friends   Complex Family Relationships   Devoted Love Interests   Manly Gay Couple   Non-linear Storytelling   Power Couple   Reversible Couple   Secret Crush   Secret Relationship   Showbiz   Slow Romance   Unconditional Love
author: Tan Shi   潭石
description:
As Liang Sizhe looked back on his journey on becoming film emperor, he knew he had mainly been favoured by fate — and Cao Ye was the one absolutely indispensable part of his destiny.

Note: There are two separate timelines, and they’ll alternate with each other. ‘N’ in front of the chapter means ‘now’ (adult) and ‘P’ means ‘past’ (youth).>
